Creative Concrete is focused on making the most out of your concrete projects by custom-making each project specifically for you. Services include stamped concrete sidewalks, concrete driveways, decorative concrete countertops and more, all designed to fit your needs.

Services offered are:

Skid Steer Work Cast-in-place Piles ICF Foundations Garage Floors
Shop Floors Basement Floors Grade Beams Retaining Walls
Driveways Steps Patios Pool Decks

....and all other concrete and building needs!

Serving the Westman region in Southern Manitoba including Minnedosa, Souris, Brandon, Carberry, Glenboro, Neepawa, Wawanesa and Waywayseecappo, and select service to other regions upon special request.
